app.title: Oh my AI!
app.subtitle: Local AI in your browser
app.description: 100% local AI chatbot running in your browser via WebAssembly. No data sent to any server.

header.installApp: Install Oh my AI! on your device

chat.runsInBrowser: The model runs entirely in your browser via WebAssembly

ram.insufficientMessage: Your device has less than {min} GB of RAM. AI models may not work properly or be very slow.
ram.tip: üí° Tip: Use a lightweight model like Phi-3.5 or Llama-3.2-1B for better performance.
ram.insufficientForInstall: Insufficient RAM for installation (minimum {min} GB required)
